metadata.synopsis: Gherva Minedale, character outside Elfsong Tavern, talking to herself in the absence of her brother Stug.

0.speaker: Gherva Minedale
0.text: Don't give me that look. Even a vigilant follower of Helm is entitled to relax now and then. Briefly.

1.speaker: Gherva Minedale
1.text: Normally, I wouldn't be hanging around a tavern, but my ne'er-do-well brother Stug told me to meet him here. And now, where is he?
